data.title: Software Engineering Intern
text: Developed web application for internal communication and information storage using microsoft power platforms
Implemented CICD practices using microsoft automate

data.title: Software Engineering Intern
text: Communicated with over 100 employees of several departments to coordinate a production schedule.
Manually operated SIG Combibloc filling machine in aseptic conditions.
Developed application that sorts and displays brix produced per min in real time using Python and Tkinter GUI library.

data.title: Software Engineering Intern
text: Developed a systematic understanding of agile practices through bi-weekly sprints and project forecasting.
Acquired experience in implementation of REST APIs and designing systems architecture.
Created several iterations of corporate intranet site by restructuring JavaScript web components.

data.title: Mechanical Engineering Intern
text: Created technical directives to update machine manuals for the STORK heat treatment equipment in replacement of obsolete cleaning-in-place systems.
Led daily briefings with mechanical teams to coordinate progressive installation of STORK.
Worked with the mechanical team in daily maintenance of aqueduct systems.
